T02D2216:224b-1: tattva pra d'i pam n'a ma britti /
T02D2216:224b-3: de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa /
T02D2216:224b-4: dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2216:224b-6: thog ma nyid du brjod par bya ba dang dgos pa dang /
T02D2216:224b-8: dgos pa'i dgos pa ma bstan na rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur ro ;
T02D2216:224b-9: /'di ltar bstan bcos 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni /
T02D2216:224b-10: ci zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la tshol bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:224b-11: gal te brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan kyang mchog tu gyur par ma bstan na //
T02D2216:224b-12: dman pa la ni mkhas pa dag 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:224b-13: gal te mchog tu gyur pa'ang gzhan gyis bsgrubs na ni ma yin te /
T02D2216:224b-14: bstan bcos 'di dgos pa med pa nyid do //
T02D2216:224b-15: de lta bas na brjod par bya ba ni gang zhig dgos pa dang 'brel pa dang /
T02D2216:224b-16: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2216:224b-19: rdzogs pa'i rim pa spyod pa dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2216:224b-20: nyan pa pos gzhung ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D2216:224b-21: de yang bstan bcos 'di med na mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel pa'o //
T02D2216:225a-0: des rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba @225a * //
T02D2216:225a-1: ni yang dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D2216:225a-2: de ltar brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bsnyad
T02D2216:225a-3: nas da ni yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro
T02D2216:225a-4: bas phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2216:225a-5: gang zhig gis ni bde ba 'thob cing sdug bsngal spong 'dod pa //
T02D2216:225a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
T02D2216:225a-7: theg pa chen po'i rigs can gang gis 'khor ba'i nyes pa spong pa dang /
T02D2216:225a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba bla na med pa thob par 'dod pas nas //
T02D2216:225a-9: nor bur bzhin du bsgrub pa ni thogs pa med
T02D2216:225a-10: par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes pas dgos
T02D2216:225a-12: bde ba'i mchog ni phyag na rdo rje yon tan
T02D2216:225a-13: phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid can te de la
T02D2216:225a-15: de nas brtsam par bya ba'i gzhi bstan par bya
T02D2216:225a-16: ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i thabs mchog de nyid sgron ma
T02D2216:225a-17: zhes smos te sems can rnams la dam pa sbyin
T02D2216:225a-18: par byed pas sgrub thabs te /
T02D2216:225a-19: gang gis las gzhan pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2216:225a-20: de bstan pa'i lung bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'i rgyud
T02D2216:225a-21: rnams la brten cing zhes pa de kho na nyid
T02D2216:225a-22: gsang ba la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams la brten pa'o
T02D2216:225a-23: // gzhan yang gang las 'ongs pa zhes pa ni
T02D2216:225a-24: rim pa nas brgyud pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2216:225a-26: 'di skad du ston te gang gi phyir de bzhin
T02D2216:225a-27: gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i don rnams thob par bya ba'i
T02D2216:225a-28: phyir sgrub pa'i thabs su phun sum tshogs pa brtsam
T02D2216:225a-29: par bya'o // de'i bar du gcod pa'i bgegs nye
T02D2216:225a-30: bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sngon du rang dad
T02D2216:225a-31: pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2216:225a-32: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i don rnams
T02D2216:225a-33: zhes bya ba de las gzhan pa zhig tu gyur
T02D2216:225a-34: na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:225a-35: de la gzhan yod par yang ma grub ste /
T02D2216:225a-36: re ba rnam par chad pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D2216:225a-37: / rigs dman par gyur pa'ang ma yin te /
T02D2216:225a-38: dgos pa thams cad 'di'i nang du 'ub la yang dag par 'dus pa'o //
T02D2216:225a-39: gsang ba'i don yang rnam pa gnyis te lam dang 'bras bu'o //
T02D2216:225a-40: lam ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa spyod pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2216:225b-0: 'bras bu ni @225b dngos grub gnyis te /
T02D2216:225b-2: rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos rnams kun //
T02D2216:225b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:225b-5: lam dang 'bras bu ni rgyud kyi brjod par bya
T02D2216:225b-6: ba ma lus pa thams cad rab tu bsdus par
T02D2216:225b-7: gyur la / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:225b-8: yang de nyid rtsom pa dgos pa med do zhe na /
T02D2216:225b-10: gang gis ni legs pa'i don gsum pa ni /
T02D2216:225b-11: de kho na nyid dang spyod par bcas pa ste /
T02D2216:225b-12: gsungs kyang don yod ces mi mthun pa'i rgyan dang bcas pa'o ;
T02D2216:225b-14: gsal ma byas pa zhes pa de kho na nyid
T02D2216:225b-15: la sogs pa ci lta ba bzhin gsal bar ma
T02D2216:225b-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D2216:225b-19: bstan pa rnams ni blo la bskal //
T02D2216:225b-21: gal te de lta na'ang bstan bcos gzhan bstan pa nyid do zhe na /
T02D2216:225b-22: des byas byas pa med mthong zhes pa slob dpon
T02D2216:225b-23: gzhan gyis byas pa'i bstan bcos dag la'ang de kho
T02D2216:225b-24: na nyid spyod pa bstan pa dang bcas pa yongs
T02D2216:225b-25: su rdzogs pa med pa'i phyir byas pa ma yin
T02D2216:225b-26: par mthong ste / de'i phyir de kho na nyid
T02D2216:225b-27: spyod pa dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsang
T02D2216:225b-28: ba 'di la dga' ba skyes zhes smos te /
T02D2216:225b-29: 'dis ni dngos su snying rje la dga' ba zhes smos te /
T02D2216:225b-30: gang gi 'bras bur gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2216:225b-31: 'dir sgrub pa po'ang ci lta bu zhig gzung bar bya zhe na /
T02D2216:225b-32: lta spyod dbang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:225b-33: lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang log pa'i lta ba ste /
T02D2216:225b-34: dngos po dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:225b-35: de dang blang bya dang spang bya'i tshul du ldan pa ste /
T02D2216:225b-37: spyod pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa dang //
T02D2216:225b-39: shin tu spros pa med pa'o //
T02D2216:225b-40: dbang ni bum pa'i dbang la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:225b-41: dam tshig ni rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa'i
T02D2216:225b-42: rten can 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams
T02D2216:225b-43: so // ldan zhes pa ni re re la'ang sbyor ro //
T02D2216:225b-44: dge ba'i chos ni dad pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2216:226a-1: tu phan 'dogs pa dang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir brgyan pa'o //
T02D2216:226a-4: yang dag pa'i gdams ngag dang dngos grub kyi snod du gyur pa nyid do //
T02D2216:226a-5: de'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin zhe na /
T02D2216:226a-6: yang dag byang chub yid la bzhag /
T02D2216:226a-8: sems can gyi don gyi phyir lam dang 'bras bu
T02D2216:226a-9: la gnas par bya'o zhes yid la byas pas so
T02D2216:226a-10: // 'di ni 'di skad du ston te ji skad
T02D2216:226a-11: smos pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhig
T02D2216:226a-12: gis thog ma nyid du las gang brtsam yang byang
T02D2216:226a-13: chub tu sems bskyed la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2216:226a-14: // ba'i don to // rnal 'byor snod can yang rigs mchog tu gyur pa bzung ba'i phyir te /
T02D2216:226a-15: 'di ltar gsang ba 'di thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-16: gal te rnal 'byor snod can gyi mtshan nyid ma bstan na /
T02D2216:226a-17: gsang ba la ni gnas pa sems can de byang
T02D2216:226a-18: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chen po
T02D2216:226a-19: 'di ming las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-20: ji ltar na chen po yin zhe na /
T02D2216:226a-21: chen po dgu dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T02D2216:226a-22: rigs chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su nges par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-23: rtsom pa chen po ni rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa brtson pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-24: mos pa chen po ni mos pa rab kyi rab nyid do //
T02D2216:226a-25: dmigs pa chen po ni sku gsum mdzad pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-26: 'bras bu chen po ni thob par bya ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-27: dus chen po ni tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-28: las chen po ni sgrib pa thams cad spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-29: byin gyis brlabs chen po ni gnas thams cad mchod par 'os pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-30: spong ba chen po ni sems bskyed nas de'i bar du gcod pa'i chos spong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226a-31: gal te de'i mtshan nyid ma bstan na thog ma nyid du rigs dman pa 'jug par byed do //
T02D2216:226a-32: de nas ni skrag pa dang skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:226a-33: de nas chos de dag las ldog par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:226a-34: de bas na rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid smos pa ni dgos pa dang bcas pa nyid do //
T02D2216:226a-35: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas gnas gang du grub ce na /
T02D2216:226b-0: @226b gnas ni ri dang yul khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:226b-1: de la ri dang yul khams dang ni //
T02D2216:226b-2: ri dang yul khams nyid do //
T02D2216:226b-3: ji lta bu gzung zhe na /
T02D2216:226b-4: yon tan thams cad ldan pa ni yid du 'ong
T02D2216:226b-5: zhing bsam gtan la phan pa'i chos nye bar gnas
T02D2216:226b-6: pa'o // mngon sum gyis ma smad pa ni mngon sum gyis ma smad pa ste /
T02D2216:226b-7: gang gi mngon sum du ri seng ge'am rdo rje la sogs pa lta bur snang ba'o //
T02D2216:226b-8: grags pas ma smad pa ni thams cad du'ang mchog tu gyur par grags pa ste /
T02D2216:226b-9: des bar chad kyi chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur te /
T02D2216:226b-10: der yang sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:226b-11: skad cig phyag na rdo rje gsal zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:226b-12: de la skad cig ni dran pa thams cad de /
T02D2216:226b-13: des phyag na rdo rje'i skur rang gsal bar bya ba'o //
T02D2216:226b-14: 'di yis gdug pa can rnams la //
T02D2216:226b-15: gzhan du 'gro ba'i bka' bsgo zhes pa ni /
T02D2216:226b-16: gnas 'dir bdag che ge mo zhig byed kyis ma 'dug cig ces bsgo'o //
T02D2216:226b-19: rdo rje 'khor lo'i thog gis gsang //
T02D2216:226b-21: rdo rje dang 'khor lo'i dbyug to dang /
T02D2216:226b-24: phur pa la sogs pa'i mtshon cha'i tshogs h'um zhes pas sna'i dbugs las bton te /
T02D2216:226b-25: gdug pa can rdul bzhin du gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2216:226b-26: de 'og khang pa bsgom zhes pa rang gi sa
T02D2216:226b-27: bon las mdun du ha ljang gu las rdo rje
T02D2216:226b-29: de las 'od kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa las /
T02D2216:226b-30: ji skad du smos pa'i khang par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2216:226b-31: yang na rang gi gnas dag tu //
T02D2216:226b-32: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni bdag las khro
T02D2216:226b-33: bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba mdog dmar ser
T02D2216:226b-34: zhags pa dang phur bu thogs pa spros te /
T02D2216:226b-35: phyogs bcu'i bgegs thams cad bcings nas phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2216:226b-36: yang na bdag las khams gsum rgyal //
T02D2216:226b-37: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni thog ma nyid
T02D2216:226b-38: du rlung dang me'i 'khor lo yid la byas te
T02D2216:226b-39: / de'i steng du ae las chos kyi 'byung gnas bsams te /
T02D2216:227a-1: cad bkug la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags kyis phur bu btab na /
T02D2216:227a-2: de'i 'og khro bo'i khang par bsam mo //
T02D2216:227a-3: yang na khang pa me dang thog ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:227a-4: khro bo'i khang pa nyid la me dpung chen po dang /
T02D2216:227a-5: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i thog dbab par tsha tsha 'khru [?] par bsam pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:227a-8: bgegs gso ba ni thun mong du'o //
T02D2216:227a-9: bka' bsgo ba ni dang po'i cho ga'o //
T02D2216:227a-11: rang gi gnas su bkug nas dang /
T02D2216:227a-12: tsha tsha 'khrug pa la sogs pa ni gcig dang gnyis dang gsum las byed pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-13: 'di dag gi las la'ang rgyu dang /
T02D2216:227a-15: thabs dang grangs dang byed pa'i las //
T02D2216:227a-16: bsam dang mtshan ma tshad dang dbyibs //
T02D2216:227a-17: kha dog rnal 'byor de yi rim //
T02D2216:227a-18: de la rgyu ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2216:227a-19: dus ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su'o //
T02D2216:227a-20: sngon du 'gro ba ni sku bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-21: thabs ni sngags dang bsam gtan tshogs pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-22: grangs ni mtshon cha lnga'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-23: las ni 'byung po bsrung ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-24: bsam pa ni sgyu ma tsam du'o //
T02D2216:227a-25: mtshan ma ni me la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-26: tshad ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-28: kha dog ni dmar nag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-29: rnal 'byor pa ni de'i las su bya ba khong du chud pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-31: thog ma nyid du ni sku bskyed pa'i cho ga
T02D2216:227a-32: la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T02D2216:227a-33: ; / de nas bla ma mchod pa'i yan lag la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2216:227a-34: de'ang dus gang gi tshe bsgom zhe na /
T02D2216:227a-35: gang tshe mtshams kyi cho ga rdzogs pa de'i tshe /
T02D2216:227a-36: bla ma mchod pa rtsom gyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2216:227a-37: rang snying mdun gyi nyi ma la //
T02D2216:227a-39: rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od kyis mdun du nyi ma'i gdan bskyed pa'o //
T02D2216:227a-40: bla ma bkug ste 'od du zhu //
T02D2216:227a-41: de las rdo rje 'chang chen sku //
T02D2216:227a-42: gnas rnams byin brlabs dbang bskur nas //
T02D2216:227a-44: rang gi sa bon las 'od lcags kyu'i tshul can
T02D2216:227b-0: byung nas bla ma'i snying gnas bzung @227b nas 'ongs
T02D2216:227b-1: te / tha mal pa'i yan lag yongs su spang ba'i phyir /
T02D2216:227b-2: rang gi 'od kyis 'od du zhu ste /
T02D2216:227b-3: zhing dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D2216:227b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen por rim pa'am cig car gyis bskyed la /
T02D2216:227b-5: de'i gnas gsum du aom a'a:h'um bkod de /
T02D2216:227b-6: ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis nus pa bskyed cing nyes pa dag par byas nas /
T02D2216:227b-7: rig pa'i lha mos dbang bskur te /
T02D2216:227b-8: de la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2216:227b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dam pa'i so bon gso ba dang /
T02D2216:227b-11: bar du gcod pa bzlog pa dang /
T02D2216:227b-12: dam tshig nyams pa sel ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:227b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bla ma la brten nas thob par 'gyur te /
T02D2216:227b-15: lung gzhan las bla ma sangs rgyas las mchog nyid
T02D2216:227b-16: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T02D2216:227b-17: // bla ma las ji lta ba bzhin du de
T02D2216:227b-18: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa las kyang
T02D2216:227b-19: bsod nams khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i
T02D2216:227b-20: // phyir / de nas bde gshegs mchod pa brtsams //
T02D2216:227b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:227b-22: bde ba chen po chos kyi dbyings nyid du gshegs pas na bde gshegs te /
T02D2216:227b-23: gang gis de mnyes par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D2216:227b-24: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2216:227b-25: sa man dza:sngags las byung ba'i //
T02D2216:227b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:227b-27: thog ma nyid du ni rang gis byang chub tu
T02D2216:227b-28: sems bskyed la gong ma bzhin du spyan drangs te
T02D2216:227b-29: / phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs par byas te /
T02D2216:227b-30: de ltar tshogs chen po bsgrub pa las gsungs pa /
T02D2216:227b-33: mchod pa'i tshogs kyang dbul bar bya //
T02D2216:227b-34: zhing ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2216:227b-35: nyes pa rnams kyang sbyang bar bya //
T02D2216:227b-36: spobs pa mi zad thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2216:227b-37: nyes pa dag kyang bsdam par bya //
T02D2216:227b-39: gzhan gyi dge la yi rang zhing //
T02D2216:227b-40: bskul dad gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D2216:228a-1: ngag yid ni phun sum tshogs //
T02D2216:228a-2: lang tsho longs spyod de bzhin te //
T02D2216:228a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul bstan pa las
T02D2216:228a-6: kyang rgyu mthun gyi 'bras bu khyad par can 'byung
T02D2216:228a-8: bdag las sprul pa'i lha tshogs kyis //
T02D2216:228a-9: sems can kun gyi don byed bsam //
T02D2216:228a-10: zhes pa rang las sprul pa'i sku dpag tu med
T02D2216:228a-11: pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spros te
T02D2216:228a-12: / sems can thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la bkod nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2216:228a-13: de ltar yang dang yang du yid du byas pas nus pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D2216:228a-14: smon lam btab pa'i 'phen pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2216:228a-15: phyi ma'i dus kyi smon lam btab //
T02D2216:228a-17: sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02D2216:228a-18: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
T02D2216:228a-19: zhes byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang
T02D2216:228a-20: btang snyoms kyi sgo nas yan lag yongs su rdzogs
T02D2216:228a-22: da ni stong pa nyid bsgoms pas kyang ye shes
T02D2216:228a-23: kyi tshogs khyad par can du 'gyur ro zhes bstan
T02D2216:228a-24: pa'i phyir / ye shes tshogs ni bshad bya ste //
T02D2216:228a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:228a-26: dang po nyid nas rang bzhin med //
T02D2216:228a-27: de ltar mos pa byed pa dang //
T02D2216:228a-29: thog mar gcig dang du ma la sogs pa dang bral ba la sogs pas /
T02D2216:228a-30: chos thams can stong pa nyid du shes par byas nas /
T02D2216:228a-31: phyis de'i ngang la stong pa nyid du lhag par
T02D2216:228a-32: mos par byas nas yang dang yang du bsgom pa
T02D2216:228a-33: na / mos pas stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T02D2216:228a-34: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa /
T02D2216:228a-35: yang na snying ga'i yi ge las //
T02D2216:228a-36: 'od byung bdag nyid zhu gyur te //
T02D2216:228a-38: rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis phung po thams cad zhu bar byas pa'o //
T02D2216:228a-39: slar 'dus rang bzhin med par gyur //
T02D2216:228a-41: 'od 'dus nas stong pa nyid du bstom [?] pa'o //
T02D2216:228a-42: stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i thabs gsal bar bstan pa ni /
T02D2216:228b-0: yul ni @228b gang la'ang mi gtong de //
T02D2216:228b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:228b-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa gang la'ang yul du mi bya ste /
T02D2216:228b-3: sems nyid kyang gang la'ang gnas par mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2216:228b-4: spyod lam zhar la byung bstan pa //
T02D2216:228b-5: gzhan pa'i yul rnams rang bzhin bzhag /
T02D2216:228b-6: ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul snang bar gyur pa rang zhir gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2216:228b-7: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis ni /
T02D2216:228b-8: gang gi lam nyid lam du gyur pa ste /
T02D2216:228b-9: gang gis dang po'i chos nyid dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D2216:228b-11: sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams ye shes te /
T02D2216:228b-12: sku gsum thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:228b-13: gal te ci bsod nams kyi tshogs kho na'am bsod nams kho na'i tshogs zhes brtags grang na /
T02D2216:228b-14: dang po ltar na'ang de las gzhan pa'i ma yin
T02D2216:228b-15: pa yin pa nyid dang gnyis pa ltar na'ang rnam
T02D2216:228b-16: smin nam bral ba'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro
T02D2216:228b-17: // 'di kho na bsod nams kyi tshogs yin no zhes nges par gzung ba'ang med de /
T02D2216:228b-18: bskyed pa'i rim pa'ang der 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D2216:228b-20: de bsgom par bya ba ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur na ;
T02D2216:228b-22: des 'gyur ba kho na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2216:228b-23: de nges par te de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:228b-24: de bas na gnyis pa la'ang de ltar blta bar bya'o zhe na /
T02D2216:228b-25: 'di nyid de gang gis dang po'i dus kyi rjes su 'brang bar byed pa nyid de /
T02D2216:228b-26: de ni de tsam du zad de /
T02D2216:228b-27: lhag ma ni de'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun par byas pa nyid do //
T02D2216:228b-28: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba brjod nas /
T02D2216:228b-29: da ni bskyed pa'i rten bstan par bya ste /
T02D2216:228b-30: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du me bdun la
T02D2216:228b-31: sogs pas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur zhig go
T02D2216:228b-32: // bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur stong ngo //
T02D2216:228b-33: bar gyi bskal ba nyi shur rlung la sogs pa rim gyis chags te /
T02D2216:228b-35: yam dang bam dang lam dag dang //
T02D2216:228b-36: sum dang bhr'um las byung ba yi //
T02D2216:228b-37: rlung dang chu yi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D2216:228b-38: sa gzhi ri rab steng dag tu //
T02D2216:228b-39: gzhal yas khang pa bsam par bya //
T02D2216:229a-1: ljang ser dpag tshad sa ya dang drug 'bum rngams su'o //
T02D2216:229a-2: chu'i ni chu rngams 'bum phrag brgyad do //
T02D2216:229a-3: gser gyi ni 'bum phrag gsum dang /
T02D2216:229a-4: stong phrag nyi shu dang brgya phrag bcu'o //
T02D2216:229a-5: ri rab ni rin chen sna bzhi las grub pa brgyad khri'o //
T02D2216:229a-6: gzhal yas khang ni khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba lta bu'o //
T02D2216:229a-8: de dbus h'um las byung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:229a-9: ji skad smos pa'i gzhal yas khang gi sems nyid
T02D2216:229a-10: snang ba yi ge h'um mthing ga 'od dang ldan
T02D2216:229a-11: pa cig gsal bar byas te /
T02D2216:229a-12: de'i 'od kyi 'phro 'du las rdo rje gdengs po sa bon dang bcas pa /
T02D2216:229a-13: de las phyag na rdo rje cung zad khro ba
T02D2216:229a-14: dang bcas par gnas par bsams la des gnod sbyin
T02D2216:229a-16: klu la sogs pa la bltas te /
T02D2216:229a-17: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas gos sngon
T02D2216:229a-18: po can snang ba'i tshul du bslangs nas yid bsdu
T02D2216:229a-19: ba'i sbyor bas sa bon brtan pa las khro bo
T02D2216:229a-20: chen po 'phags pa gos sngon po can ji skad
T02D2216:229a-21: smos pa'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bsam par
T02D2216:229a-22: bya'o // ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa sngon
T02D2216:229a-23: du 'gro bas dbang bskur bas kyang ji skad du
T02D2216:229a-24: bshad pa'i sku khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bstan
T02D2216:229a-25: bya'o // pa'i phyir / ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02D2216:229a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:229a-27: mchod pa ni spos la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:229a-28: gtor ma ni bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:229a-29: des mnyes pa ni mgu bar byas pa'o //
T02D2216:229a-31: don ched 'di yis gsol ba gdab //
T02D2216:229a-32: ces pa sems can gyi don du'o //
T02D2216:229a-33: gsol ba gdab pa'i tshig ni go sla'o //
T02D2216:229a-35: bum pa la sogs dbang rnams blang //
T02D2216:229a-36: zhes pa bum pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa blang pa'o //
T02D2216:229a-37: de la bum pa'i dbang ni rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ste ;
T02D2216:229a-39: gsang ba'i dbang ni lag pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2216:229a-40: shes rab ye shes ni rig pa'i yum gyis bde ba byin pa'o //
T02D2216:229a-41: bde ba chen por rtag tu dgyes //
T02D2216:229a-42: zhes pa ni dbang bzhi pa ste /
T02D2216:229a-43: don dam pa'i phyir bden pa la gnas pa'o//
T02D2216:229b-0: @229b rten ji lta bu la bskur zhe na /
T02D2216:229b-1: phyis ni gnas gsum byin brlabs te //
T02D2216:229b-2: zhes pa rang gi sku bskyed pa'i rjes su gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2216:229b-3: de nas yongs su bslang ba'i don gyi 'khor gyi sku bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2216:229b-4: de nas phyogs bcu'i lha mo yis //
T02D2216:229b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:229b-6: phyogs bcu'i lha ni sgeg mo la sogs pa ste /
T02D2216:229b-7: de dag rnam pa'i tshul du byung nas bskul zhe'o //
T02D2216:229b-8: aa la la ho zhes pa ni dga' ba'i mdangs can gyis so //
T02D2216:229b-9: gang la zhe na shu kra su ka ste /
T02D2216:229b-10: byang chub sems bde ba'i dang las so //
T02D2216:229b-11: bde ba chen po ni don dam pa'i sgo nas bod pa ste /
T02D2216:229b-12: bcom ldan gsang mchog thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2216:229b-14: bos nas ci byed ce na /
T02D2216:229b-15: 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs ni sku khro bor bzhengs shig pa'o //
T02D2216:229b-16: ci byed ce na 'gro ba'i don la spyod ces
T02D2216:229b-17: pa dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa sems can gyi
T02D2216:229b-20: ma rig rmongs pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir te
T02D2216:229b-21: blun par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir ro

T02D2216:229b-27: rdo rje padma byin brlabs nas //
T02D2216:229b-28: zhes pa ni rdo rje de h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02D2216:229b-29: rtse mo nor bus mtshan pa dang /
T02D2216:229b-30: padma'i nang bhr'um las gzhal yas khang du bsams te /

T02D2216:229b-32: lha mos bskul zhes pa ni sa dang nam mkha'
T02D2216:229b-33: la gnas pa'i lha mos 'khor gyi sku bskyed par
T02D2216:229b-34: bskul ba'o // dga' ba'i spyod pa ni /
T02D2216:229b-35: 'chang ba dang 'khyud pa dang 'jib pa dang spyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:229b-37: padmar rdo rje bstims te bskyod pa'i sgras sangs rgyas

T02D2216:230a-2: lhag ma ni phyogs skyong gsal ba dang /
T02D2216:230a-3: dbus kyi 'khor lo la bzung ba'i phyir te /

T02D2216:230a-7: yum gyi bha ga las phyir bton te /

T02D2216:230a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes pa la sogs pas ni gdon pa'i sngags bstan to //
T02D2216:230a-11: de nas lha so so'i mtshan nyid bstan pa /
T02D2216:230a-12: phyogs dang ming dang kha dog dang mtshan ma dang /
T02D2216:230a-13: rgyan dang gnas dang las dang chas gos kyis shes par bya ste /
T02D2216:230a-14: shar du sangs rgyas gos sngon can //
T02D2216:230a-15: zhes pas ni phyogs dang ming bstan te /
T02D2216:230a-16: bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:230a-17: zhal dang sku ni dkar la 'tsher //
T02D2216:230a-18: zhes pa ni kha dog gi khyad par bstan te /
T02D2216:230a-19: dri za thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:230a-20: 'khor lo dang ni dril bu bsnams //
T02D2216:230a-21: zhes pa ni g-yas dang g-yon na go rims bzhin no //
T02D2216:230a-22: sprul dkar po dang gos sngon po'i sham thabs la
T02D2216:230a-23: sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa ni rgyan gyi
T02D2216:230a-24: mtshan nyid do // gnas ni shar gyi padma la brten pa nyid do //
T02D2216:230a-25: las ni dri za thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:230a-26: chas gos ni rgyan gyi phyogs gcig go //
T02D2216:230a-27: de bzhin du rin po che dang padma dang las
T02D2216:230a-28: kyi gos sngon can la sogs pa thams cad kyang
T02D2216:230a-29: blta bar bya'o // de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
T02D2216:230a-30: lha'i 'khor lo bskyed nas dbang blang ba bstan par
T02D2216:230a-31: blta bar bya'o // bya ste / de'i phyir gnas
T02D2216:230a-32: gsum byin gyis brlabs pa'am zhes lha thams cad kyi
T02D2216:230a-33: gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2216:230a-34: yang na lha mos dbang bskur zhing //
T02D2216:230a-35: zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa bzhin du dbang blang ba'o //
T02D2216:230a-36: de nas bdag la bstim pa'am //
T02D2216:230a-37: zhes pa ni gnyis su med par bstim pa'o //
T02D2216:230a-38: yang na gsum 'dus sbyor ba bya //
T02D2216:230a-40: gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs la dbang blangs te /

T02D2216:230a-42: gzi byin dang yan lag yongs su rgyas par 'gyur
T02D2216:230a-43: bar bsam mo // de yi rjes su bya ba yang //
T02D2216:230a-44: dmigs dang gsal ba'i cho ga bya //
T02D2216:230b-0: zhes pa rang gi sku la yang @230b yang dang yang du 'dris par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2216:230b-1: gal te bsgom pas skyon sngags bzlas pa dang /
T02D2216:230b-2: tshogs bya ba dang gtor ma byas pa gang yin pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2216:230b-3: dngos su na bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rig pa'i lha'i sku la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D2216:230b-4: sems can bskyed pa la sogs pa las gzhan du

T02D2216:230b-6: pa'i phyir ro // gzhan ni sngon du 'gro ba
T02D2216:230b-7: dang rten byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang
T02D2216:230b-8: pa'i phyir ro // 'brel pa'i phyir / de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2216:230b-9: ting nge 'dzin yang 'dir slob pa'i dus te gzhan
T02D2216:230b-10: du na ni ha cang thams cad par 'gyur ro

T02D2216:230b-12: nyi ma dang zla ba dang 'dus pa ni drod gsher las skyes pa nyid do //
T02D2216:230b-13: 'od kyi gong bu las skyes pa ni sgo nga las skyes pa'o //
T02D2216:230b-14: dran pa tsam gyis skye ba ni rdzus te skye ba'o //
T02D2216:230b-15: mkha' gsang sbyor ba las byung ba ni mngal nas skye ba'o //

T02D2216:230b-18: // rlung steng du bskyed pa ni dga' ldan la sogs pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D2216:230b-19: rang dang mnyam du gnas pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //

T02D2216:230b-30: zag gi don du sbyor ba sdus pa 'di bstan
T02D2216:230b-31: zhe'o // sngon du bla ma sangs rgyas la //

T02D2216:231a-29: de las sems bzung rim pa bstan pa ni //

T02D2216:231a-31: 'di'ang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis gsum ste /

T02D2216:231b-18: pa spangs pas de nyid la gsal bar 'gyur ba'o

T02D2216:231b-21: gnas bzhir te mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte
T02D2216:231b-22: ba dang gsang ba'i gnas su me dang sa dang
T02D2216:231b-23: chu dang rlung zhes bya ba dmar po dang /
T02D2216:231b-26: ljang gu rnams zu' [?] gsum dang gru bzhi dang
T02D2216:231b-27: zlum po dang zla gam gyi rnam par bkod de
T02D2216:231b-28: / dbugs kyi stobs kyis 'og tu bstim pa ni rgod pa'i dus su'o //
T02D2216:231b-29: de las bzlog pa ni bzlog pa'i dus su'o //
T02D2216:231b-30: phyi dang nang du 'byung ba'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2216:231b-31: gong du bstan pa nyid rgyas par bshad pa /
T02D2216:231b-32: khams gsum la sogs shes pa dang //
T02D2216:231b-33: ral gri yang ni sbyor bar bya //
T02D2216:231b-34: zhes pa gang gis yul gyi rtog pa 'byung ba
T02D2216:231b-35: de'i tshe khams gsum thams cad gcig pa ma grub
T02D2216:231b-36: pas phyogs cha drug gi cig car sbyar na rdul
T02D2216:231b-38: de ma yin na grib ma dang sgrib pa mi rung ba dang /
T02D2216:231b-39: gong bu thams cad rdul phra rab tu 'gyur ba
T02D2216:231b-40: nyid dang rim gyis 'gro ba med pa la sogs
T02D2216:231b-41: pa'i phyir ro // de ltar khams gsum rdzas dngos
T02D2216:231b-42: su ma grub pa bzhin du rang gi lus dang
T02D2216:231b-43: sha dang rus pa dang pags pa dang spri dang
T02D2216:231b-44: rgyu ma dang gnye ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D2216:231b-45: nyid kyis gcig dang rtag pa dang gtsang ba dang
T02D2216:231b-46: bde ba la sogs pa ma grub pa'o //
T02D2216:231b-47: mtshan ma'i stobs kyis sems gzung ba ni ;
T02D2216:232a-0: @232a * // phyag gnyis gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02D2216:232a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D2216:232a-2: de'i bsod nams ni sku gsal bar ma gyur na
T02D2216:232a-3: mtshan dam pa dang rtag pa dang de las gzhan
T02D2216:232a-4: gyi mtshan mas de gsal bar 'gyur ba nyid do
T02D2216:232a-5: // grogs kyi rnam pas sems bzung ba ni /
T02D2216:232a-6: zas dang skom dang gnas dag gis //
T02D2216:232a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas tsha ba la
T02D2216:232a-8: sogs pas nyen pa la ni de dang 'gal ba'i
T02D2216:232a-9: zas dang skom dang gnas brten par bya'o //
T02D2216:232a-10: dus kyi bye brag ni go sla'o //
T02D2216:232a-11: de ltar sems bzung ba bshad nas /
T02D2216:232a-12: da ni bogs dbyung ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D2216:232a-13: dang po dkar po ljang gu'i bar //
T02D2216:232a-14: re re dang ni lnga 'dus pa //
T02D2216:232a-16: dang po'i mtha'i zas ni dkar por ro //
T02D2216:232a-17: ser po dang dmar po dang /
T02D2216:232a-20: de las ri rab til 'bru'i bar //
T02D2216:232a-21: zhes pa ni ri rab tsam du dang til 'bru rnam ba'i bar du ste /
T02D2216:232a-22: mthing ga dang dkar po la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
T02D2216:232a-23: stong gsum gang dang gcig 'dus pa //
T02D2216:232a-24: zhes pa lnga dang bcu dang dpag tu med pa'i bar du ste /
T02D2216:232a-25: kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag gis grangs bzhin no //
T02D2216:232a-26: de ltar sku'i bogs dbyung ba bshad nas rdo rje'i
T02D2216:232a-27: bogs dbyung ba de ltar thugs la bslab par bya
T02D2216:232a-28: ste / kha dog ces pa ni rdo rje'i kha dog lnga la rim bzhin no //
T02D2216:232a-29: dbyibs kyi bogs dbyung ba dbyibs dang zhes pa ni che ba dang chung ba'o //
T02D2216:232a-30: grangs kyi bogs dbyung ba grangs de bzhin no zhes
T02D2216:232a-31: pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi dbang bskur dang
T02D2216:232a-32: rdo rje las rim bzhin mang ba dang nyug bar
T02D2216:232a-34: bogs dbyung ba'i sbyor ba'am gang gis thog mar mthing
T02D2216:232a-35: ga skad cig ma las dkar po rjes su dran
T02D2216:232a-36: pa dang / skad cig dang rgyun la sogs pa dang /
T02D2216:232a-37: ser po las che bar gyur pa rang gi rnam
T02D2216:232a-38: pa las skad cig dang rgyun la sogs pa dang
T02D2216:232a-40: gang gis sku'i skad cig ma las skad cig dang
T02D2216:232a-41: rgyun la sogs pas rdo rje'i rnam pa la dmigs
T02D2216:232a-42: pa dang / yi ge'i bar la de dag gi
T02D2216:232b-0: rnam pas yongs su gsal @232b bar gyur pas sku
T02D2216:232b-1: sna tshogs pa dang mtshan ma sna tshogs par gnas
T02D2216:232b-2: pas dang po'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur
T02D2216:232b-3: pa dang / te / de ltar bogs dbyung ba bshad zin to //
T02D2216:232b-4: da ni sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te /
T02D2216:232b-5: dang po gang zag gang gi dbang du byas she na /
T02D2216:232b-6: bsgom la mi gzhol zhing gsang sngags gtso cher byed
T02D2216:232b-7: pa zhes pa gsang sngags la ched du byed pa
T02D2216:232b-8: dang / bsgom pa la ni mi mos pa dang /
T02D2216:232b-9: spyod pa gzhan la mi mos pa'o //
T02D2216:232b-10: de'i dbang du byed pa'i sngags rnam pa gnyis las
T02D2216:232b-11: dang po thun mong gi sngags gsal ba'i don la
T02D2216:232b-12: dmigs pa'i bzlas pa ni bdag dang gzhal yas 'khor
T02D2216:232b-13: bcas dmigs zhes pa ni sngags kyi bzlas pa dang
T02D2216:232b-14: ldan pas thun ji lta ba bzhin du de'i rnam
T02D2216:232b-15: pa la yang dang yongs su gtod pa'o //
T02D2216:232b-18: rgyud spyod pa'i don la dmigs pa las sdig pa dbyung ba ni /
T02D2216:232b-19: sdig pa'i lus las phyir 'byin pa'o //
T02D2216:232b-20: bsreg pa ni lus kyi nang du bsreg pa'o //
T02D2216:232b-21: bkru ba ni bdud rtsi'i chus so //
T02D2216:232b-22: gnas gang gi sa bon gyis de ltar byed ce na /
T02D2216:232b-23: h'um dang ram dang h'um bskul te zhes pa lte pa'i h'um dang gsang ba'i ram dang /
T02D2216:232b-24: spyi bo'i ham mthing ga dang /
T02D2216:232b-25: dmar ser dang dkar po'i kha dog can dang rim bzhin no //
T02D2216:232b-26: 'od zer gyi bye brag bstan pa la /
T02D2216:232b-27: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma yis //
T02D2216:232b-28: zhes pa 'od zer 'ba' zhig pa dang /
T02D2216:232b-29: yi ge'i phreng ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2216:232b-30: yi ge'i 'od dang bcas pas so //
T02D2216:232b-31: ci byed ce na gang zhig byed //
T02D2216:232b-32: ces pa ni gong ma dang 'brel ba'o //
T02D2216:232b-34: 'og nas steng gi sbyor gnyis kyis //
T02D2216:232b-35: dang po'i las gnyis byed pa ste //
T02D2216:232b-36: bzlog pas phyi ma'i sbyor ba byed //
T02D2216:232b-37: gsum gsum dgu yi bdag nyid can //
T02D2216:232b-39: mtshan ma 'dod pa'i don la dmigs pa las yum bsgrub pa'i bzlas pa ni /
T02D2216:232b-40: gad tshe yum dang bzhi skor dang //
T02D2216:232b-42: mgal ma la sogs pa'i rim gyis sna rtse bzhi la brgyud de bzlas te /
T02D2216:232b-43: klu dbang 'khyil ba'i stobs can gyis //
T02D2216:232b-44: khro mos yum ni sgrub par byed //
T02D2216:233a-4: ye shes kyi 'khor la bsgrub pa ni /
T02D2216:233a-5: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor nyis skor dang //
T02D2216:233a-7: mdun du sangs rgyas thams cad blos bzhag ste /
T02D2216:233a-8: 'od zer ba thag gzings pa lta bu'am /
T02D2216:233a-9: re re'i rnam pa can gyi dbang du byas te /
T02D2216:233a-10: mgal me la sogs pa dang rim bzhin no //
T02D2216:233a-11: 'khor sgrub pa la sum skor te //
T02D2216:233a-12: zhes pa 'khor nus pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:233a-13: nges par ma grub na gtso bo dang 'khor gyi
T02D2216:233a-14: bzlas pa dang zhes pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D2216:233a-15: bkug ste / gtso bo dang 'khor dus gcig ba dang re re'i bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2216:233a-16: gal te des ma grub na snying nang brtson 'dra'i
T02D2216:233a-17: bzlas pa dang zhes 'khor thams cad snying du bsdus
T02D2216:233a-18: te / bzlas pa gong bzhin no //
T02D2216:233a-19: de ltar thun mong gi bzlas pa'i bsam gtan rdzogs
T02D2216:233a-20: nas khyad par gyi bzlas pa las dgug pa'i bzlas
T02D2216:233a-21: pa ni / kha nub phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2216:233a-22: dga' ba yid la byas nas bya'o //
T02D2216:233a-23: de yang sngags 'od dkyil 'khor rnams la phyogs ces
T02D2216:233a-24: pa la sogs pa'i thog mar padma gos sngon can
T02D2216:233a-25: gyi tshogs la mnyes par byas te /
T02D2216:233a-26: thob pa dang ldang ba'i rim pas /
T02D2216:233a-28: zhes pa'i mtha' dang bcas pas 'od zer mdun gyi
T02D2216:233a-29: lha la spros pas de'i 'od las lcags kyu can
T02D2216:233a-31: gdul bya'i snying gnas bzung nas 'ong bar bsams na
T02D2216:233a-32: rdo rje nyid kyang 'gugs par 'gyur na gzhan lha
T02D2216:233a-33: ci smos / ral gri la sogs thog 'bebs dang //
T02D2216:233a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni //
T02D2216:233a-35: snga ma cho ga sngon du song nas lhor bltas te /
T02D2216:233a-36: sngags bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis ye shes 'khor lo
T02D2216:233a-37: las ral gri dang spu gri dang 'khor lo la
T02D2216:233a-38: sogs pa'i thog gis bkug pa'ang de nyid shi bar
T02D2216:233a-39: bsam pa dang / khro bo mtshon cha can gyi
T02D2216:233a-40: tshogs kyis gdul bya'i sha bcad cing dum bur byas
T02D2216:233a-41: bsam pa dang / par bsam pa'o // bstab pa
T02D2216:233a-42: ni de'i cho ga'i lhag ma me ste go sla
T02D2216:233a-43: bsam pa dang / par bsam pa'o // / khro tshogs 'khor lo thogs pa yis //
T02D2216:233a-44: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don te /
T02D2216:233a-45: 'od zer las 'khor lo thogs pa dpag tu med
T02D2216:233b-0: pas gdul bya'i klad bar @233b 'khor lo thogs pas
T02D2216:233b-1: bskor zhing mgo 'khor bar bsam pas sbyar bar 'gyur
T02D2216:233b-2: ro // rnga mo can gyi khro tshogs kyis //
T02D2216:233b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:233b-4: rlung gi rnga mo la zhon pa'i khro bo'i tshogs
T02D2216:233b-5: byung nas gdul bya'i snying ga nas bzung nas rnga
T02D2216:233b-6: mo la bskyon nas khro bo gzhan gyis brdeg bzhin
T02D2216:233b-7: du rlung lha'i phyogs su song bar bsams na /
T02D2216:233b-8: nges par gzhan du bskrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:233b-9: 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs byung nas //
T02D2216:233b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni gdug par gyur pa dgug par 'gyur ba /
T02D2216:233b-11: sngon du song nas 'od dkar pos sdig pa dbyung
T02D2216:233b-12: ba la sogs pas zhi bar 'gyur te sbrul gyi
T02D2216:233b-14: gang zhig gis ni bcud rnams bsdus //
T02D2216:233b-15: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:233b-16: rang bzhin yang rung 'od kha dog ser pos dgug bya'i gnas nas bcud bkug ste /
T02D2216:233b-17: snying ga'i dbus su ni mngon par shes pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:233b-18: klad pa'i dbus kyis ni tshe rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:233b-19: lus khyab pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:233b-20: rten gzhan las bkug pas ni tshe bcud rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:233b-21: sngags 'od rdo rje la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:233b-22: gdu bya'i lus kyi nang rdo rje gdengs po bskyed
T02D2216:233b-23: pa sprul pa'i rdo rje ga de das pos bsdus
T02D2216:233b-24: te / bstim pa ste rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:233b-25: 'od zer kha dog sna lnga las //
T02D2216:233b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni //
T02D2216:233b-27: 'od zer so so las mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs spros te /
T02D2216:233b-28: mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2216:233b-29: gang zhig las ni 'od byung bas //
T02D2216:233b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni sngags bzlas
T02D2216:233b-31: pas snying ga'i sa bon gyis rang gi lus 'od
T02D2216:233b-32: du zhu ste / de yang 'dus nas phra rab
T02D2216:233b-33: skra rtse'i tshad tsam du gyur pa ni dang po'o
T02D2216:233b-34: du zhu ste / // de yang 'dus pa ni bla na med pa'o //
T02D2216:233b-35: gsang sngags skyon rnams rab spangs nas //
T02D2216:233b-36: zhes pa ni sgra che ba dang chung ba dang skyen pa dang bul ba dang /
T02D2216:233b-38: g-yeng ba dang bar du gcod pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2216:233b-40: 'bras bu thob pa ste gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2216:233b-41: sngags zlos pa'i dus su dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2216:234a-1: sngags kyi bsam gtan bshad nas /
T02D2216:234a-2: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir //
T02D2216:234a-3: gang gis tshogs rnams rdzogs byed cing //
T02D2216:234a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:234a-5: 'jig rten rdzas rnams ma lus pa //
T02D2216:234a-6: kun tshogs zhes pa ni kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i rdzas thams cad do //
T02D2216:234a-8: 'tsham pa dang ni mchod pa zhes pa ni lha'i
T02D2216:234a-9: rnal 'byor lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa de'i steng du
T02D2216:234a-10: 'tsham pa bzhi dang mchod pa bzhi'o //
T02D2216:234a-11: sngon 'gro sa chog la sogs rdzogs //
T02D2216:234a-12: zhes pa ni thog mar yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su phyin te /
T02D2216:234a-13: sa bslang ba dang brtag pa dang sbyang ba dang bzung ba dang bsrung ba dang /
T02D2216:234a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon gyi cho ga bya'o //
T02D2216:234a-15: de nas lha'i zhes pa la sogs pa go sla /
T02D2216:234a-16: de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2216:234a-18: dang por thig legs par btab nas /
T02D2216:234a-19: de nas tshon bkye ba dang ;
T02D2216:234a-21: de tshe rgyal po zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2216:234a-22: sbyor ba rgyas pa'i bskyed pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2216:234a-23: rgyal po yis ni sems dpa' bskul //
T02D2216:234a-25: rdo rje slob dpon gyis las kyi rnal 'byor la rta mgrin gyi brda bstan pa'o //
T02D2216:234a-27: phyi rol 'khor la bsdus byas nas //
T02D2216:234a-29: phyi'i rnal 'byor pa khrus byas nas nang du bkod pa'o //
T02D2216:234a-30: bdag gi 'jug pa ji bzhin du //
T02D2216:234a-31: 'khor rnams dam pa'i don la 'jug / ces pa ni /
T02D2216:234a-32: rang dang mthun par tshogs bsags pa nas rang gi snang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2216:234a-33: gang zhig gis ni rol mo dang //
T02D2216:234a-34: ldan pas tshogs ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2216:234a-36: gang gis dung dang pi wang dang gling bu la
T02D2216:234a-37: sogs pa dang ldan pas tshogs kyi rdzas dbul ba'o
T02D2216:234a-38: // skom dang mchod pa sngon song nas //
T02D2216:234a-40: snang ba'i lha la bdud rtsi dbul ba dang /
T02D2216:234a-41: rang gi sems dpa' la khrus bya ba'o //
T02D2216:234a-42: tshogs kyi rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2216:234a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:234a-44: dri'i chus nye bar gtor te rdzas 'od du zhu ba las /
T02D2216:234a-48: de'i nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2216:234b-1: na da ha go ku las mi dang glang po
T02D2216:234b-2: che dang rta dang ba lang dang khyi'i sha dang
T02D2216:234b-3: / bi ra shu ma mu las byang sems gnyis
T02D2216:234b-4: dang dri chen dri chu sha chen dangs ma lngar
T02D2216:234b-5: / gyur pa las / aom gyi 'od kyis rlung
T02D2216:234b-6: bskyod pa la sogs pa dang a'a:sa byang chub sems
T02D2216:234b-8: h'um gis bdud rtsi dang rdo rje dbab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bya'o //
T02D2216:234b-10: bdag mchod dkyil 'khor mdun du mnyes //
T02D2216:234b-11: cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs par bya //
T02D2216:234b-12: zhes pa thog mar sems ye shes kyi 'khor lo mchod pas mnyes par bya ste /
T02D2216:234b-13: bstod pa dang nyes pa bshags pa'i yan lag rdzogs nas rang gi snying du bsdus te /
T02D2216:234b-14: rlung dang me'i sbyor bas nang gi sbyin sreg rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2216:234b-15: de nas mdun du bton te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas /
T02D2216:234b-17: phyi rol du ni mchod par byas //
T02D2216:234b-19: mandala sngon po la phyogs skyong 'khor dang bcas pa bkug ste /
T02D2216:234b-20: byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas /
T02D2216:234b-21: phyi rol du lhag ma sbyin par bya zhing las bcol bar bya'o //
T02D2216:234b-22: de ltar thun mong gi cho ga bshad nas /
T02D2216:234b-23: khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni //
T02D2216:234b-24: zab pa sprul par brten pa dang //
T02D2216:234b-25: bzhi dang gsum dang nges par sbyar //
T02D2216:234b-27: shes rab ma dang snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D2216:234b-28: de'i drod bskul bas sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhu ba dang /
T02D2216:234b-29: chos dang bde ba chen po'i bar du zhu bar bya'o //
T02D2216:234b-30: yang na zas byang chub sems kyi chu gtum mo'i gnas su bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2216:234b-31: de las rgyas nas bde ba chen po'i bar du'o //
T02D2216:234b-32: 'o na zhi ba la sogs pa'i las gang gis shes par bya zhe na /
T02D2216:234b-33: sngags kyi sbyor ba bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2216:234b-34: de kho na ltar sbyar zhe'o //
T02D2216:234b-35: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo bstan nas /
T02D2216:234b-36: da ni tshogs kyi mchod pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2216:234b-38: bdag po rdzas rnams dman pa dang //
T02D2216:234b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:234b-40: rdzas ni lnga ste tha ma'i tshad do //
T02D2216:234b-41: bcu ni rab kyi tshad do //
T02D2216:234b-42: slob dpon gcig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi byed pa'o //
T02D2216:234b-43: gnyis ni sbyor pa gtsor byed pa'o //
T02D2216:235a-0: @235a * // spyad par dka' ba'i khyab 'jug gi bu mo rigs ldan yang sbyor na gzhan lta ci smos she'o //
T02D2216:235a-1: yan lag rgyas pa tshogs 'khor bzhin //
T02D2216:235a-3: cho ga'i yan lag rgyas pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo bzhin te /
T02D2216:235a-4: bsdus pa la sogs pa ci rigs su'o //
T02D2216:235a-5: dkyil 'khor gcig ni snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2216:235a-6: gnyis ni rang dang bcas pas so //
T02D2216:235a-8: don du gnyer ba khyad par du 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:235a-9: bzhi pa ni phyogs skyong la sogs pa'o //
T02D2216:235a-10: slob dpon nus pa'i bye brag gis //
T02D2216:235a-11: las gzhan rtsom na gong ma bzhin ;
T02D2216:235a-12: / zhes pa ni las rtsom par nus na sngags bzhin du'o //
T02D2216:235a-13: mi rtsom gyur na sdig pa sbyang //
T02D2216:235a-14: zhes pa ni las sbyong ba bzhin du'o //
T02D2216:235a-15: 'dir tshogs gang yin pa'i 'khor lo dang //
T02D2216:235a-16: mchod pa yang de nyid dam 'khor lo dang mchod pa gang yin pa de yin nam zhe na /
T02D2216:235a-17: tshogs yin la 'khor lo dang mchod pa ma yin pa yang yod de /
T02D2216:235a-18: gang gis yan lag spangs ba de nyid lta bu'o //
T02D2216:235a-19: tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin la mchod pa ma yin pa yod de de nyid do //
T02D2216:235a-20: mchod pa yin la 'khor lo ma yin pa yod de /
T02D2216:235a-21: rdzas dang slob dpon gyis dman par byas pa de nyid do ;
T02D2216:235a-22: / de las gnyi ga ma bzlog pa yang yod de rgyud kyi bye brag lta bu'o //
T02D2216:235a-23: gzhan gyi ming gi phyogs gcig pa'ang yod de /
T02D2216:235a-24: tshogs spangs pa'i ming can no //
T02D2216:235a-25: ci'i phyir tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhe na /
T02D2216:235a-26: 'dis nyes pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:235a-27: ci'i phyir tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2216:235a-28: 'di la brten nas dam pa'i yul mnyes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:235a-29: yang na rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don gyis 'khor lo'o //
T02D2216:235a-30: de las bzlog pa'i don gyis mchod pa'o //
T02D2216:235a-31: yang na tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po dang mthun
T02D2216:235a-32: par rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa la gnas pa'i
T02D2216:235a-33: phyir ro // tshogs kyi 'khor lo gzhan yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2216:235a-34: kun du tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2216:235a-35: kun du rol pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2216:235a-36: kun du dag pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2216:235b-0: kun du thob pa zhes bya ba'i @235b tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2216:235b-1: kun du bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T02D2216:235b-2: tshogs kyi rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to //
T02D2216:235b-3: da ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2216:235b-5: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2216:235b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:235b-7: sngon bya gzhan ni gzhan du ste sa'i cho ga
T02D2216:235b-8: dang bsnyen pa'i cho ga la sogs pa ni gzhan
T02D2216:235b-9: las shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2216:235b-10: thabs kyi las su bya ba bstan pas /
T02D2216:235b-11: sa yi rigs bzhir thab khung bzhi //
T02D2216:235b-12: zhes pas kha dog dkar po dang ser po dang
T02D2216:235b-13: dmar po dang nag po la zhi ba dang rgyas
T02D2216:235b-14: pa dang dbang dang drag po'i thab khung bya'o //
T02D2216:235b-15: zlum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thams cad kyang go rims su sbyar ro //
T02D2216:235b-16: thab khung byin gyis brlabs pa bstan pa /
T02D2216:235b-18: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:235b-19: ram gyi sa bon gyi 'od kyis thab mi dmigs
T02D2216:235b-20: pa las las dang rjes su mthun pa'i bhr'um du
T02D2216:235b-21: gyur / de las thab kyi gzhal yas khang kha
T02D2216:235b-22: dog dang dbyibs gong ma lta bu la gtos nam
T02D2216:235b-23: mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2216:235b-24: de nas rdzas byin gyis brlab pa /
T02D2216:235b-25: mchod rdzas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:235b-26: mi dmigs snod nang sva yig las //
T02D2216:235b-27: so so'i de nyid rgyas pa la //
T02D2216:235b-29: rdzas mi dmigs pa las tr'am las rin po che'i kha dog snod du gyur /
T02D2216:235b-30: de'i nang du sva las so so'i rdzas dpag tu med par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2216:235b-31: ha ho:hr'i yis skyon rnams bsal //
T02D2216:235b-33: has kha dog gi nyes pa phrogs /
T02D2216:235b-34: ho:dang hr'is dri dang ro'i nyes pa dag par byas
T02D2216:235b-35: nas ji skad smos pa'i kha dog la sogs par
T02D2216:235b-37: de nas me las su bya ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2216:235b-38: de'ang las dang mthun pa'i thab khung du ram las me bskyed la me spar bar bya ste /
T02D2216:235b-39: zhi ba la ni zho can las byung ba'i me rlung g-yab kyis sbar bar bya'o //
T02D2216:235b-40: rgyas pa la ni kha dog ser po'i shing la'o //
T02D2216:235b-41: dbang la ni seng ldeng gi shing la rdo rjes sbar te /
T02D2216:235b-42: drag po la dug dang tsher ma can gyi shing la'o //
T02D2216:236a-0: de ltar sbar nas mar gyi dang @236a * //
T02D2216:236a-1: blugs bdun dzva la ram zhes pa'i sngags kyis dbul lo //
T02D2216:236a-2: de nas me brtag par bya ste /
T02D2216:236a-3: gal te mtshan ma ngan na las thams cad pa'i chus gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2216:236a-4: de nas me lha bskyed pa ni /
T02D2216:236a-5: ae las gru gsum zhes pa ni /
T02D2216:236a-6: las dang mthun pa'i kha dog bzhi las gru gsum kha dog bzhir gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2216:236a-7: gru gsum gyi zur gsum la aom a'a:h'um ste /
T02D2216:236a-8: de nyid gsum dbus na ram dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2216:236a-9: gdan gang gi steng du bsam zhe na /
T02D2216:236a-10: pad steng zhes smos te 'di ltar zhi ba la ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2216:236a-11: dbang la ni me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2216:236a-12: drag po la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2216:236a-13: de'i steng du so so'i padma kha dog bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyi steng du'o //
T02D2216:236a-16: de rnams 'od du zhu ba las so //
T02D2216:236a-17: kha dog bzhi yi bdag nyid la //
T02D2216:236a-18: zhes pa ni las so so'i dbang du'o //
T02D2216:236a-19: so so'i rigs kyis dbu brgyan bya //
T02D2216:236a-21: rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang
T02D2216:236a-22: snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pas so
T02D2216:236a-23: // lte bar gong ma'i sbyor ba ste //
T02D2216:236a-24: zhes pa ni gru gsum yi ge bzhi dang bcas pa bsam pa'o //
T02D2216:236a-25: snying gar phyogs skyong bcu dang ldan //
T02D2216:236a-27: padma 'dab ma bcu la phyogs skyong bcu rdzogs par ro //
T02D2216:236a-28: de las ye shes me lha dgug / ces pa
T02D2216:236a-29: ni ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs te mdun
T02D2216:236a-30: du mchod pa dang bstod pas mnyes par byas te
T02D2216:236a-31: pa stim pa'o // byin brlabs dbang bskur ni gang du bshad do //
T02D2216:236a-32: gzi byin bskyed pa ni dgang blugs kyis so //
T02D2216:236a-33: de ltar me lha'i sku bskyed nas /
T02D2216:236a-34: de nas me lha la go bskon te /
T02D2216:236a-35: snying gar rdo rje rgya gram ha ljang gus mtshan pa /
T02D2216:236a-36: de'i lte ba'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D2216:236a-37: de'i lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa ram gyis mtshan pa bsam mo //
T02D2216:236a-38: so so'i mchod pa dbul byas te //
T02D2216:236a-39: zhes pa ni spos la sogs pas mchod do //
T02D2216:236a-40: de nas sreg rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa ni /
T02D2216:236a-41: gzar bu rdo rje la sogs pa'i //
T02D2216:236a-42: kha dog dbyibs ldan byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2216:236b-0: zhes pa gzar @236b bu rin po che sna bzhi
T02D2216:236b-1: las grub pa thab kyi dbyibs dang mtshan ma dang
T02D2216:236b-3: ram gyis mtshan par bsam mo //
T02D2216:236b-4: shing gi 'od ni bskyed byas te //
T02D2216:236b-5: zhes pa ni yam shing phul bas me lha'i 'od bskyed par bsam mo //
T02D2216:236b-7: zhes pa ni mar sreg blugs kyis 'od 'phros pas de'i rnam pa thams cad gyur pa'o //
T02D2216:236b-8: de ni las thams cad la sbyar ro //
T02D2216:236b-10: dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum gyis //
T02D2216:236b-11: spyi dang so so'i sdig pa 'byin //
T02D2216:236b-13: dkar gsum phul bas me lha mnyes te /
T02D2216:236b-14: de'i 'od zer gyis lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa
T02D2216:236b-15: so sor 'byin par mi byed kyi spyir 'byin pa'o
T02D2216:236b-16: // lhag ma ni de las bzlog pa nyid de /
T02D2216:236b-18: gong gi gnyis pa so sor 'byin //
T02D2216:236b-20: lus dang ngag gi so so'i nyid du'o //
T02D2216:236b-21: nas thug 'o ma'i thug pa yis //
T02D2216:236b-22: re re'i gnas su sreg par byed //
T02D2216:236b-24: lus kyi sdig pa dang ngag gis so so'i lte ba dang mgrin pa'i gnas su bsreg pa'o //
T02D2216:236b-25: til gyis snying gi nang nas 'byin //
T02D2216:236b-27: yang til gyis sgo dgur 'jug ces pas ni /
T02D2216:236b-28: yid kyi sdig pa 'od nag po la sogs pa'i
T02D2216:236b-29: tshul du dbyung ba dang bsreg pa yang shes par
T02D2216:236b-30: bya'o // tha ma mar gyis 'khru bar byed //
T02D2216:236b-31: ces pas ni mar phul ba de'i snying stobs kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung ste /
T02D2216:236b-33: zhi pa'i sreg rdzas dbul ba bshad zin to //
T02D2216:236b-34: rdzas de ser por byas pa ni bsam gtan nam mtshan mas so //
T02D2216:236b-35: dkar gsum gyis ni gzi byin bskyed /
T02D2216:236b-37: 'od kha dog ser po phog pas rang gzi byin bskyed pa'o //
T02D2216:236b-38: mngar gsum 'byung khungs bsal ba ste //
T02D2216:236b-40: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgongs pa'i tshul du bsal ba'o //
T02D2216:236b-42: ye shes bcud rnams spyi bor 'gugs //
T02D2216:236b-43: zhes pa ni rdzas des me lha mnyes te /
T02D2216:237a-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bcud spyi bor zhugs te gzhag pa'o //
T02D2216:237a-2: nas dang 'o ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2216:237a-4: zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i bcud byang chub sems kyi
T02D2216:237a-5: ngo bor lus kyi gnas thams cad du 'gugs pa'o
T02D2216:237a-6: // tha mar t'ur ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2216:237a-7: mdzod spu snying ga'i h'um la sdud //
T02D2216:237a-9: d'ur ba bsreg pa'i stobs kyis mdzod spu nas bcud byang chub sems su bsdus te /
T02D2216:237a-11: de nas byung bas lus thams cad rgyas par bsam mo //
T02D2216:237a-13: rgyas pa'i sreg rdzas dbul ba bshad zin to //
T02D2216:237a-14: ba lang sha yi gtor ma dang bcas pa zhes bya bas ni rdzas bstan to //
T02D2216:237a-15: gsum skor la sogs kyis zhes pas ni /
T02D2216:237a-17: myur du 'gugs shing dbang du byed //
T02D2216:237a-20: lcags kyu thogs pa'i lhas 'gugs par byed do //
T02D2216:237a-21: dbang du byed pa ni 'od 'phros pa tsam gyis so //
T02D2216:237a-22: dbang gi sreg rdzas dbul ba bshad zin to //
T02D2216:237a-23: dang po sha yis khro ba ste //
T02D2216:237a-24: zhes pa ni sha phul bas me lha khros par gyur to //
T02D2216:237a-26: de ltar sreg rdzas rnams phul nas bstod pa bya
T02D2216:237a-27: ba dang las bcol ba 'di ni me lha'i cho
T02D2216:237a-28: ga'i rim pa'o // snying gar bkod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:237a-29: rang gi snying ga'i phyogs skyong dag par byas la //
T02D2216:237a-30: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa sbyor ba gsum gang yang rung bas lha bskyed de ;
T02D2216:237a-31: bstod pa'i bar rim ba bzhin du byas nas gshegs
T02D2216:237a-32: su gsol ba 'di ni lha'i cho ga'i rim pa'o
T02D2216:237a-33: // de nas mjug gi dbang du bya ba ni /
T02D2216:237a-34: da ni zhar la byung ba bshad par bya ba ste /
T02D2216:237a-35: bsrung ba zhi ba'i cha la gdags //
T02D2216:237a-36: zhes pa ni zhi ba'i bye brag yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:237a-37: gzhan la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2216:237a-38: gang gi phyir sbyin sreg gi cho ga rnam pa
T02D2216:237a-39: gnyis kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa gnyis su shes par
T02D2216:237a-40: bya'o // de la sbyin sreg gnyis ni rang gi dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir ro //
T02D2216:237a-41: rnal 'byor pa ni sbyin sreg gi las kyi rim pa la mkhas pa dang /
T02D2216:237b-0: @237b slob dpon gyi tshad du phyin pa ste /
T02D2216:237b-4: rang gi don gyi yang gnyis te /
T02D2216:237b-5: sdig pa sbyong ba dang dngos grub sgrub pa'o //
T02D2216:237b-6: dang po'i ni dang po nyid de gnyis pa ni /
T02D2216:237b-7: bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten pa'o //
T02D2216:237b-8: de ltar dbye ba'i sgo nas rnal 'byor pa rab
T02D2216:237b-9: dang 'bring dang tha ma'i tshad bstan nas lung kha
T02D2216:237b-10: cig las gnas kyi rtog pa nyes par mi 'gyur
T02D2216:237b-11: bar bshad pa gang yin pa de yang rnal 'byor
T02D2216:237b-12: ba rab la dgongs par shes par bya ste /
T02D2216:237b-13: gzhan du na gzhan bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2216:237b-14: de ltar sbyin sreg gi cho ga rgyas par bshad nas /
T02D2216:237b-15: da ni gtor ma'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2216:237b-16: sha khrag rus pa 'bru la sogs //
T02D2216:237b-17: zhes pa 'dis ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rdzas bstan to //
T02D2216:237b-18: ma spyad snad du blugs zhes pa ni /
T02D2216:237b-19: rin po che'i snod ma spyad pa'am thod pa mtshan ldan gyis rgyas pa'i nang du'o //
T02D2216:237b-20: de nas byin gyis brlabs pa ni gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2216:237b-21: dkyil 'khor bzhi yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2216:237b-23: rang gi byang chub sems kyi chus //
T02D2216:237b-24: ji ltar snying ga'i lha mchod pa //
T02D2216:237b-25: zhes pa ni spyi bo nas chu byung bas snying
T02D2216:237b-26: ga'i lha rnams kyi zhal du gsol bar bsam mo
T02D2216:237b-29: bla na med pa'i dngos grub tshogs kyi gang zag gis ma myangs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:237b-37: 'bras bu rim pa bzhin du bstan to //
T02D2216:237b-38: gang zag thams cad ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2216:237b-39: dman pa dang mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02D2216:237b-40: de la dman par gyur pa'am de'i gnas su ni /
T02D2216:237b-41: 'bru la sogs pa thun mong gi gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2216:237b-42: mchog gam mchog gi gnas su ni thun mong ma yin pa'i gtor ma bya'o //
T02D2216:237b-43: yang gnyis te zla dang bcas pa'am zla med pa'o //
T02D2216:237b-44: de dag dang gnyis kyang go rims bzhin te gzhan du na nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:237b-46: dge slong la sogs dman pa yi //
T02D2216:238a-2: zab mo'i las su bya ba yang //
T02D2216:238a-3: de yi gnas su spang bar bya //
T02D2216:238a-4: gal te byas na sems can de //
T02D2216:238a-6: gang yang dgon pa chen po dang //
T02D2216:238a-7: gsang pa'i lam la gnas pa der //
T02D2216:238a-8: gsang ba chen po'i spyod pa 'di //
T02D2216:238a-9: spyad pa tsam gyis 'bras bu thob //
T02D2216:238a-12: gang gis thun mong thun mong min //
T02D2216:238a-13: rmad byung gtor ma'ang de bzhin te //
T02D2216:238a-15: rnam gnyis thub pas gsungs pa la //
T02D2216:238a-16: rang gis smad pa'i rdzas gyur dang //
T02D2216:238a-17: 'byung khungs dman las byung ba dang //
T02D2216:238a-18: rigs dang nye bar ma spyad pa //
T02D2216:238a-19: de la dngos grub med par 'gyur //
T02D2216:238a-21: gtor ma'i cho ga bshad zin to //
T02D2216:238a-22: de nas spyod lam gyi ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
T02D2216:238a-23: de la mkhas pa ni bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan pa'o //
T02D2216:238a-24: des yul gzugs la blta ba'i dus su ji ltar lta zhe na /
T02D2216:238a-25: sgyu ma mig yor lta bu ste //
T02D2216:238a-26: zhes pa snang la rang bzhin med par bsam pa'o //
T02D2216:238a-27: dngos po'i lta ba rab bzlog nas //
T02D2216:238a-28: zhes pa gzugs kyi lha mor sgom pa'o //
T02D2216:238a-29: dmigs sogs sems dpa'i 'khor lo can //
T02D2216:238a-30: zhes pa rdo rje gos sngon can bsam pa'o //
T02D2216:238a-31: der ni lha mo rtag tu dgyes //
T02D2216:238a-32: zhes pa gzugs kyi lha mo dang gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
T02D2216:238a-33: yid ni tshim par byed pa'i mchog / ces pa
T02D2216:238a-34: byang chub sems dbang po'i lam nas snying gar phab
T02D2216:238a-35: pas bde bar gyur pa ste /
T02D2216:238a-37: 'di lta ste tha mal ba'i dus su sa bon
T02D2216:238a-38: can gyi rnam par shes pa sa bon du gnas
T02D2216:238a-39: pa rkyen nye bar gnas pas bslangs nas yul dang
T02D2216:238a-41: de nas yul gyi rnam par skye'o //
T02D2216:238a-42: de nas rang dang mthun pa'i sa bon 'jog cing chos gzhan skyed par byed do //
T02D2216:238a-43: 'dir chos 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2216:238a-45: spyod lam gyi ting nge 'dzin bshad zin to //
T02D2216:238a-46: de nas nang gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya ste /
T02D2216:238a-47: de'ang gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni dri rtsom par byed pa ste /
T02D2216:238b-2: gang byed ce na lan du /
T02D2216:238b-3: rnal 'byor mchog gi byed pa ste //
T02D2216:238b-4: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin dam pas byed pa ste /
T02D2216:238b-6: gang la zhes pa'i lan du /
T02D2216:238b-7: snying ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D2216:238b-8: snying gi nang du dam tshig sems dpa'i 'khor lo bkod la /
T02D2216:238b-9: ye shes kyi lha bkug ste bstim pa'o //
T02D2216:238b-10: lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2216:238b-11: lce yi 'khor lo chen po ni //
T02D2216:238b-12: byin za ru ni dmigs par bya //
T02D2216:238b-14: me lha nyid du dmigs pa'i dus //
T02D2216:238b-15: de'i ming de skad ces bya'o //

T02D2216:245b-28: tsha ba bskyed pa'i sbyor ba bya //

T02D2216:246a-0: @246a * // las kyi khro bo ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste //
T02D2216:246a-1: nges dbye ba ni dbral ba'o //

T02D2216:246a-31: gdug pa'i sprul nag sbyor ba ni stong gsum nas

T02D2216:246b-0: 'thungs pa'o // thod par klad pa 'khor lo @246b bskor ;

T02D2216:246b-13: sdig pa'i chogs byung nas sha dang rus pa la

T02D2216:246b-15: ro // gong du sha ba'i 'khor lor ldan //

T02D2216:246b-17: rtsibs bzhi la h'um zhes pa bzhi bris la /
T02D2216:246b-18: lug gi thod pa'am lkugs nas shi ba'i thod par
T02D2216:246b-19: bcug ste mnan na lkugs nas shi bar 'gyur ro

T02D2216:246b-24: snying nang sprul nag bcug byas te //
T02D2216:246b-25: zhes pa ni snying gi nang du sprul nag po

T02D2216:246b-30: bsam gtan kho na yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2216:246b-31: mdun du za byed kha gdengs la //
T02D2216:246b-32: zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i mdun du khro bo za
T02D2216:246b-33: byed kha gyen du lta ba kha nas me 'bar
T02D2216:246b-34: ba bsams la de'i steng du bsgrub bya ba kug
T02D2216:246b-35: ste / bsam gtan gyi phur bu spyi bor btab pas rkang par thal byung ste /
T02D2216:246b-36: de'i rjes su khrag phyung bas za byed kyi khar
T02D2216:246b-37: song bar bsam ba ni las gzhan gyi sbyor ba'o

T02D2216:247a-1: sreg / ces pa ni rdo rje las 'od me
T02D2216:247a-2: lta bu byung bas lus sa bon dang bcas ba
T02D2216:247a-3: sreg par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2216:247a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni //

T02D2216:247a-7: spyi bo na sa bon bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste /
T02D2216:247a-8: khro bo za byed kyi khar song bar bsam mo /

T02D2216:247a-12: sa bon thams cad bshig pa dang bsreg pa dang dbyung bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2216:247a-14: yang na 'khor lo nag po'i steng //
T02D2216:247a-16: tsa nag po las byung pa'i 'khor lo'i steng du'o //
T02D2216:247a-17: de'i steng du bsgrub bya bzhag la snying gi nang
T02D2216:247a-18: du zhes ba la sogs pa'i don ni rang gi

T02D2216:247a-26: yi ge dkrugs pa la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2216:247a-28: yang na dbang phyug mthu chen gyis //
T02D2216:247a-29: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don te //

T02D2216:247a-42: gdul bya zhing du gyur pa zhes bya ba ci

T02D2216:247b-0: gsod pa dang / pa'o // drag po las kyi bsgrub pa @247b bshad zin to //

T02D2216:247b-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin no //

T02D2216:248a-38: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsal bar bshad par bya ste /
T02D2216:248a-39: de la rdzogs pa zhes pa ni sku gsum ste /

T02D2216:248a-42: pa ste gang gis bsgom pa'i rim pa nyid do

T02D2216:248a-45: dmigs pa'i tshul yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2216:248a-46: yod pa dngos su bsgom pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2216:248a-47: snying gar bcu drug brgyad dang bzhi //
T02D2216:248a-48: dbus gnas thabs dang shes rab bar //
T02D2216:248b-0: dkar @248b zhing zlum pa'i thig le bsam //

T02D2216:248b-4: de'i dbus su byang chub sems kyi thig le skra
T02D2216:248b-5: rtse'i tshad tsam dkar zhing zlum pa bsam par bya'o
T02D2216:248b-6: // 'byung bzhi'i dang po yi ge brgyad ;

T02D2216:248b-10: yi ge rnams kyang 'od kha dog lnga dang ldan
T02D2216:248b-11: pa rtse mo las ba thag phra mo dbus kyi

T02D2216:248b-24: gnas pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can //

T02D2216:248b-28: / bcad pas rtse mo dang rtsa ba'i bar du gnas pa gnyis la bslab par bya'o //

T02D2216:248b-32: par bya'o ; / bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba gzhan yang gsungs pa /

T02D2216:248b-35: mgrin pa'i padmar kha bye bsam //

T02D2216:248b-45: rlung la bslab pa snga ma bzhin no //

T02D2216:249a-3: thams cad la slob pa yang ngo //
T02D2216:249a-4: snang ba mtha' yas kyi gnas na zhes pa ni longs spyod kyi gnas su'o //
T02D2216:249a-5: bzhi bcu'am ni zhes pa bcu drug dang bzhi pa'i rnam pa gyen dang thur du lta ba'o //
T02D2216:249a-6: sum cu gnyis zhes pa ni /
T02D2216:249a-8: 'byung ba bzhi ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2216:249a-18: zhes pa thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas g-yas dang g-yon du bskor ba'o //
T02D2216:249a-19: gang zhig spyi bo'i khang pa ru ;
T02D2216:249a-21: bde ba chen po'i gnas su'o //
T02D2216:249a-22: sum cu gnyis dang bzhi zhes pa ni /
T02D2216:249a-24: de las gyen du lta ba dang thur du lta ba'i bye brag gis grangs su bgrang par bya'o //
T02D2216:249a-25: a'a li gnyis ni nyis skor ro //
T02D2216:249a-26: k'a li gcig ni sde lnga pa dang /
T02D2216:249a-29: lte ba ni lte ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D2216:249a-30: dpa' bo gsang ba ni byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can te thams cad la sbyor ro //
T02D2216:249a-31: brgya dang nyi shu brgyad pa'am //
T02D2216:249a-32: zhes pa ni drug cu bzhi nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:249a-33: phyed bcus ni drug cu bzhi nyid do //
T02D2216:249a-34: yi ge ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2216:249a-38: kha cig slob pa'i dus dag tu //
T02D2216:249a-39: nyi ma rdo rje'i sbyor ba ste //
T02D2216:249a-40: zhes pa ni rab gtum gyi lte bar nyi ma'i
T02D2216:249a-41: steng du rdo rje me lta bu bsams la rlung
T02D2216:249a-42: bsdus pas dbab ces bshad do //
T02D2216:249a-43: la la yi ge thig ler 'dod //
T02D2216:249a-45: thig le dkar dmar gyis dbab pa ni /
T02D2216:249a-47: aa thung dun gyis dbab pa ni /
T02D2216:249a-49: bzhi ni so sor slob pa ste //
T02D2216:249a-50: zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa nyid do //
T02D2216:249a-51: gcig ni mdud par slob pa'o //
T02D2216:249a-52: zhes pa ni 'og nas ston to ;
T02D2216:249a-54: gang gis rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2216:249a-55: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo la slob pa'o //
T02D2216:249a-56: sum cu gnyis dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2216:249a-57: ni rtse mo dang rked pa dang de'i cha dang
T02D2216:249a-59: bzhi po kho na zhes pa ni /
T02D2216:249b-0: rtse mo la sogs par rlung @249b gi 'gro ldog gis bsdu'o //
T02D2216:249b-1: brgyad ni steng 'og gnyi ga'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2216:249b-2: gnyis ni bde ba chen po gnyis la ste dbab pa dang /
T02D2216:249b-4: dbab pas dga' ba skye ba dang //
T02D2216:249b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa ni byang chub kyi sems gnas pa'i bye brag gi dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-6: da ni rnal 'byor ma la brten pa'i cho ga bshad pa /
T02D2216:249b-7: gang tshe rang gi rigs mthun pa //
T02D2216:249b-9: rang la mdzes pa'i rgyan yod pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-10: byin gyis brlabs nas gnyis med sbyor //
T02D2216:249b-12: gsang ba'i snying po byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rjer zhugs pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-13: des dga' ba rnams rim gyis bskyed pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-14: shes rab ma'i dbye ba bstan pa las las skyes pa ni /
T02D2216:249b-15: khu khrag dang bcas pa las skyes pa'i bu mo'o //
T02D2216:249b-16: ye shes kyi bu mo ni bde bar gshegs pa las sprul pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-17: g-yon gyi yum ni g-yon gyi yum nyid do //
T02D2216:249b-18: snying gar byung ba ni sa bon las sprul pa'i bu mo'o //
T02D2216:249b-19: rkang pa thi gus bcing ba ni lag pa dam du 'khyud de bsdams pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-20: dbugs kyi lcags kyu bzlog pa ni dbugs gyen du drangs pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-22: nyi ma'i me ni lte bar 'bar //
T02D2216:249b-24: gang gis lte ba nas ting nge 'dzin gyis gtum mo spar te /
T02D2216:249b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'byed 'dzums kyis
T02D2216:249b-28: rlung sngon po bskyod pa la sogs pa'i bde ba
T02D2216:249b-29: chen po nas / byang chub kyi sems bkug ste /
T02D2216:249b-30: 'khor lo rim gyis gang bar bsam pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-31: rnal 'byor ma zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:249b-32: longs spyod dang sprul pa'i gnas su sa bon bsam pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-33: thabs ni zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:249b-34: bde ba chen po dang chos kyi 'khor lo sa bon gyis rgyas pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-35: sprul gyi zhags pas zhes pa la sogs pa'i don no /
T02D2216:249b-36: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas ham las sa bon
T02D2216:249b-37: byung ba zhu nas kun du 'khyil par bsam pa'o
T02D2216:249b-38: // de nas 'khor lo rgyas pa'i dus bstan pa ni /
T02D2216:249b-39: gang gis gtso bo'i sbyor ba la //
T02D2216:249b-40: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2216:249b-41: gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin gsal nas /
T02D2216:249b-42: de las gzhan du zhu bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2216:249b-43: yang na rnal 'byor bde chen por //
T02D2216:249b-44: gsal nas khyab pa'i sbu ldang zhing //
T02D2216:249b-47: gang gis ham la blo gtad de gsal ba dang /
T02D2216:250a-4: 'phar ba la sogs pa byung nas ham las sa bon phab ste /
T02D2216:250a-5: dga' ba gsum bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2216:250a-6: yang na 'khor lo'i sbyor spangs pas //
T02D2216:250a-7: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:250a-8: mdud pa ni bcu drug la sogs par byang chub sems kyi rim par dag pa'o //
T02D2216:250a-9: gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas na //
T02D2216:250a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:250a-11: dus des bskyed pa yongs su rdzogs pa la //
T02D2216:250a-12: 'bras bu dam pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2216:250a-14: bdud dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa //
T02D2216:250a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:250a-16: gang zhig gis thog ma nyid du byang chub tu
T02D2216:250a-17: sems bskyed pa nas bzung pa'i dge ba'i stobs kyis
T02D2216:250a-18: gnod par gyur pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i
T02D2216:250a-19: phyir ro // da ni sgrub pa'i thabs gtad pa ni yul mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas te /
T02D2216:250a-20: bstan pa gang zhig don 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
T02D2216:250a-21: de dag gi don yang kha phyir bltas pa dang nyon mongs pa mang ba dang /
T02D2216:250a-22: ched du mi byed par gyur pa la spel na /
T02D2216:250a-23: tshe 'di dang tshe rabs phyi ma thams cad du
T02D2216:250a-24: sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2216:250a-25: // 'on gang zhig la bstan par bya zhe na /
T02D2216:250a-26: snod ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:250a-27: gzhan la mi spel ba dang /
T02D2216:250a-31: dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2216:250a-33: sems kyi don la dga' ba la byin na legs
T02D2216:250a-34: pa thams cad kyi rgyur 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don
T02D2216:250a-35: to // da ni nyes pa sbyang bar bstan pa /
T02D2216:250a-36: bdag 'dra ma rig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni shes rab zhan pa dang /
T02D2216:250a-37: gting dpag dka' bas brtsam par bya ba ma yin
T02D2216:250a-38: kyang rang bas dman pas rtogs par sla pa'i phyir
T02D2216:250a-39: bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2216:250a-40: bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por bsngo ba ni /
T02D2216:250a-41: bdag gis bsgrubs 'di zhes pa'i don ni /
T02D2216:250a-42: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /
T02D2216:250a-43: sems can rnams mngon par mtho ba dang /
T02D2216:250a-44: nges par legs pa thob par smon to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2216:250a-45: de ltar bzod par gsol ba dang /
T02D2216:250a-46: nyes pa bshags pa 'dis ni bstan bcos dman par
T02D2216:250a-47: gyur pa'i nyes bdag pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba
T02D2216:250a-48: mi zad cing shin tu 'phel bar yang bstan to
